```{r}
library(here)
library(readr)
coldata <- read_tsv(here("extdata","coldata.tsv"))
```

```{r}
coldata$files <- here("extdata","quant",coldata$run,"quant.sf.gz")
coldata$names <- coldata$run
```

```{r}
library(tximeta)
se <- tximeta(coldata)
```

```{r}
colData(se)
```

```{r}
assayNames(se)
```

```{r}
rowRanges(se)
```

```{r}
str(metadata(se))
```
